definition: idol drama/drama series in which the actors are chosen for their preexisting popularity with young viewers
to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe

sentences.english: It's the most popular soap opera in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 这可是日本最超人气的偶像剧呢。

sentences.english: Jiro Wang starred the movie "Purple House" and idol drama "Absolute Boyfriend".
sentences.chinese: 汪东城主演了电影《紫宅》和偶像剧《绝对达令》。

sentences.english: Winners stand a chance to role-play in the988idol drama.
sentences.chinese: 获胜者有机会在988偶像剧扮演角色。

sentences.english: Korean idol drama quietly replaced on this separate status hotted up.
sentences.chinese: 韩国偶像剧就这样悄悄地取代日剧的地位火了起来。

definition: theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
handsome high-powered businessman (a type of character in an eponymous genre of romantic fiction who typically has a soft spot for a girl of lower social status)
Zhou Yumin or Vic Zhou (1981-), Taiwan singer and actor, member of pop group F4
to appear (in a show etc)/an appearance (on stage etc)
